text:
Hey Superpath!

I'm hosting a roundtable conversation for marketing leaders this Thursday at 10am MT.

We're talking about Copywriting - how to write in a way that gets read and gets results.

It's part of Clique Elevate, a membership group to connect and support the next generation of CMOs. Elevate members include marketing leaders from orgs like Harvard, USA Volleyball, NAACP, Contently, etc.

For Thursday, if you'd like to learn more about the topic or you're an expert on the topic, you're invited! Just LMK you're interested and I'll send you the Zoom link.

Have a great week and I hope to see some of you there!

text:
You can always do a cold email outreach to the podcast directly to see if they need additional help with their content creation.

Or else, make a list of podcast marketing agencies and reach out to them with good samples.
